main event: Two round objects were observed moving in a zigzag pattern near Mineral Wells, Texas on July 13, 1960.
interesting points: The objects changed color from intense white to dark red during the observation., The sighting lasted for about 5 minutes., Observations indicated that the objects moved behind clouds., The witness described the objects as being the size of half dollars., The objects' movements were inconsistent with typical balloon behavior.
witness description: 26-year-old maintenance instructor from a helicopter school in Camp Wolters
